1.0.0.name: wordpress/woocommerce-total-web-solutions-gateway
1.0.0.description:
The Total Web Solutions plugin for the Woocommerce shopping cart.

Once this has been installed, the module can be configured through the Woocommerce payment section.

Enable the payment gateway and configure the account as described in the 'Installation' section.

The module should first be set to test mode and the TWS payment script used.

Note - an account with Total Web Solutions is required before using this module. Please contact sales@totalwebsolutions.com for more information.
